dao module

class dao.dao[source]

Bases: object

The dao class has been created in order to interact which the database to add, query and delete the information from alumno.

borrar_tabla(cadena_texto)[source]

This method is meant to be removed the table student or school

Parameters: con: The needed connection to be capable of database interaction. cadena_texto: This variable identifies whether it is a student or a school to be performed different actions.

crear_tabla_alumno()[source]

This method is meant to be created the student table in case it does not exist.

Parameters: con: The needed connection to be capable of database interaction.

crear_tabla_colegio()[source]

This method is meant to be created the school table in case it does not exist.

Parameters: con: The needed connection to be capable of database interaction.

insertar_registro(object, cadena_texto)[source]

This method is meant to be added a new entrance to the table.

Parameters: con: The needed connection to be capable of database interaction. object: Here we shared the personal information that is stored in the database.

The object contains the name and id.

cadena_texto: This variable identifies whether it is a student or a school to be performed different actions.

recuperar_datos(cadena_texto)[source]

This method is meant to be recoved the information either from student or school

Parameters: con: The needed connection to be capable of database interaction. cadena_texto: This variable identifies whether it is a student or a school to be performed different actions.
